main.name: Emmett Brady
main.description: with proficiency in the MERN stack and the software development lifecycle. Methodical problem solver known for leadership, attention to detail, and taking initiative to find creative solutions to complex issues. Committed to lifelong learning with a passion for expanding my knowledge.
main.bio: Full stack web developer with a background in agriculture and a passion for coding. Recently completed the UC Berkeley Extension School Full Stack Web Development Boot Camp and am looking to begin my career in web development. I enjoy toiling in the garden, hanging out with my dog, and annoying my wife.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: 12 week full-time program focused on programming skills including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Semantic UI, MongoDB, MySQL, Express, React.js, and Node.js
Degree in Anthropology with a focus on sustainable agriculture and food systems.

work.company: Marin County Dept. of Agriculture, Weights & Measures
work.title: Agricultural Inspector III
work.description: Oversaw Marin Organic Certified Agriculture (MOCA) organic certification program which certifies 50 operations in the Bay Area and grossed $150,000 annually. Supervised and trained a team of 4 agricultural inspectors. MOCA received the USDA Data Integrity Award three years in a row due to workflow changes implemented when I took over the program. Performed agricultural and weights & measures inspections, issued fines and violations, and followed up until issues were corrected resulting in greater environmental and consumer protection.

work.title: Farmers Market Manager
work.description: Oversaw weekly Bay Area farmers markets with up to 150 vendors generating revenue ranging from $2,000-10,000/week with attendance up to 15,000/day. Assisted in operations management of all AIM farmers markets. Maintained and updated social media and website. Managed the volunteer program and supervised assistant market managers.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
